levels.title: Your First AI Prompt
levels.story: Welcome to AI-assisted development. You're about to create your first prompt to Claude.
levels.objective: Write a prompt to create a landing page description for a coffee shop
hints: Tell the AI what you want (headline + tagline)
Give it context (coffee shop type, values)
Specify the tone or vibe you're going for
levels.example: Create an engaging, creative landing page headline and tagline for a specialty coffee shop called 'Brew Haven' that emphasizes artisanal quality and community.

levels.title: The SCOPE Framework
levels.story: Level up your skills with SCOPE: Specify role, Context, Output, Parameters, Examples.
levels.objective: Write a SCOPE-based prompt for email marketing copy
hints: S = What role should the AI play?
O = What exact format do you want?
P = What are your constraints (length, tone)?
E = Show an example of good output
levels.example:
S - Expert SaaS email copywriter
C - Project management tool for remote teams
O - Subject line + 3-paragraph body
P - Max 150 words, focus on pain points
E - 'Stop context-switching. Start shipping.'

levels.title: Using Delimiters for Clarity
levels.story: Keep prompts organized with delimiters. AI responds better to structure.
levels.objective: Write a prompt using delimiters to transform reviews into marketing copy
levels.example:
ROLE: Marketing copywriter
TASK: Transform this review into testimonial
REVIEW: 'Saved me hours weekly. So intuitive!'
FORMAT: 1-2 sentences
TONE: Professional + friendly

levels.title: Adding Examples (Few-Shot)
levels.story: Show AI what 'good' looks like. Examples guide better outputs.
levels.objective: Write a prompt with 2-3 examples for product descriptions
levels.example:
Generate product descriptions like these:
Example 1: 'Our journals are where thoughts become reality. Premium paper, elegant design.'
Example 2: 'Wireless earbuds that disappear. Premium sound, all day battery.'
Now create 3 more in this style for...

levels.title: Iteration & Refinement
levels.story: Getting 80% there? Refine with follow-up prompts. Iteration is your power.
levels.objective: Write a follow-up prompt to improve AI output
hints: Tell AI exactly what to change
levels.example: Great! But make it edgier and more conversational. Add 1-2 emojis per caption and cut the length by 50%. Sound like you're talking to friends, not customers.

levels.title: Prompt Templates
levels.story: Create templates for speed and consistency. Build once, use forever.

levels.title: Cursor IDE Magic
levels.story: Now meet Cursor. It's like ChatGPT built into your code editor.
levels.objective: Write a prompt for Cursor to generate a React component
levels.example: Create a responsive navbar with logo, menu, hamburger mobile version. Use Tailwind CSS. Smooth transitions on hover.
levels.lesson: AI IDEs read context and generate matching code

levels.title: GitHub Copilot Comments
levels.story: Comments are instructions. Copilot reads them and completes your code.
levels.objective: Write an instructive comment that Copilot will understand
hints: Be specific about what you want
levels.example: // Fetch user profile, handle network errors, return formatted user object with defaults

levels.title: Full-Page Generation
levels.story: AI can generate complete landing pages, not just snippets.
levels.objective: Write a prompt for a full HTML landing page
levels.example: Generate a complete HTML landing page for a fitness app. Include: header, hero, 3 feature cards, testimonials, footer. Modern design. Use realistic placeholder text.
levels.lesson: AI can build full products with good prompts

levels.title: Ship Your First Project
levels.story: You've learned prompt mastery. Now build something real and ship it.
levels.objective: Pick an idea and ship it
levels.example: Pick a project idea. Use AI to generate landing page + backend API docs. Push to GitHub. Ship it.

easterEggs.prompt: What's the most important skill I learned?
easterEggs.response:
The most important skill: Knowing what to ask. Prompting is the meta-skill of the AI era.

+50 XP for wisdom!

easterEggs.prompt: Can I become a developer without knowing Python/JavaScript?
easterEggs.response:
YES. With Cursor + Claude, you don't need memorized syntax. You need thinking skills + prompting skills + shipping mentality. That's the new developer.

+75 XP for the right question!

easterEggs.prompt: How do I know if my prompt is good?
easterEggs.response:
A good prompt produces output you'd be happy to ship. If you're tweaking AI output 5+ times, your prompt needs work. Clarity + Examples + Tone = First-try wins.

+50 XP for meta-thinking!
